TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000KhaSy:ref

Hello,


We have uninstalled the client from all the endpoints(except around 250 which are not seen by the console, and we have already opened a ticket for that), and we will deploy via Intune the last client version.
Please let the ticket open to see on the next client upgrade job if the issue was resolved or not. But I bet it isn't.


Thanks,
Cristian

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00432488. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00432488
Ticket Subject: Very slow progress on the Client Software Upgrade job
Ticket Details: Hi Team,

Regina Maria team reached out to me mentioning that they are currently working to upgrade their clients to version 6.2.4.1006 to fix the interoperability with Bitdefender described within the release notes for 5.9.4.1. (Improved Stealthy DPI Interoperability
with Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools / #319842 / EPPSUPPORT-3713, page 21: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4_ReleaseNotes/resource/Netwrix_EndpointProtector_5.9.4_BugFixList.pdf<https://lsems.gravityzone.bitdefender.com/scan/aHR0cHM6Ly9oZWxwY2VudGVyLm5ldHdyaXguY29tL2J1bmRsZS9FbmRwb2ludFByb3RlY3Rvcl81LjkuNF9SZWxlYXNlTm90ZXMvcmVzb3VyY2UvTmV0d3JpeF9FbmRwb2ludFByb3RlY3Rvcl81LjkuNF9CdWdGaXhMaXN0LnBkZg==/ACCF8A3C7FE6AAD10341ADFD74D10BD20CF1BC5A6B211B41FEA6C8A204CC325C?c=1&i=1&docs=1>).

An upgrade job was created for this purpose under System Configuration > Client Software Upgrade, but very little progress is seen for it.
Server version is 5.9.4.1.

When replying, please also add following email address: it.security@reginamaria.ro

Please let us know if other details would be needed here.

Thank you,

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #432488 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000KhaSy:ref - [EXTERNAL]RE: 00432488 - Very slow progress on the Client Software Upgrade job

TextBody:
Hi Cristian,

If you will install the latest client version - the one from 5941 and then wait for the next release until you could perform a client upgrade (as only a new server release will contain a new version of clients) this means that this Support ticket needs to remain open for 1-2 months until the next release.
Unfortunately this is not possible currently due to Netwrix policy of not keeping tickets open for such a long time for situations when the customers need to test a fix in their environment.

But I want to help you, as always did and would like to propose you to close this ticket - with your approval of course. And once the new patch is available with a new set of clients I will personally connect along with you and try the client upgrade.
Please also find below my direct tel no.  0756293746 - on which you can call me directly in case you face any issue in this sense - I will also help with a new ticket raise for this topic at that time!

Looking forward for your confirmation.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com




This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.
